description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Djibouti, Djibouti. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Djibouti Five-Star Kempinski Palace Luxury on the Horn of Africa with Two Infinity Pools
hotels.description: Set on the Horn of Africa, you'll find the five-star Djibouti Palace Kempinski - a luxurious haven of timeless elegance, opulent interiors and spectacular views. Experience the epitome of luxurious Kempinski hospitality as you discover the fascinating landscape of Djibouti, where rugged mountains and low desert plains roll into sapphire waters. Lounge by one of the two infinity pools and take in the breathtaking views over the Gulf of Tadjoura, or visit the beach and explore the underwater kaleidoscope of marine life. Later, indulge in a treatment at Kempinski The Spa or sweat it out in the fitness centre. Dig into international buffet bites at Lac Assal, enjoy Italian fine dining at Tentazioni, look out across the horizon with a drink in hand at Sky Lounge or visit one of the other onsite restaurants and bars to find something to soothe every appetite.

seo.title: Hoteles en Djibouti - Djibouti Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Djibouti, Djibouti con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
